abstract: Offshore drilling in Brazil, which analysts expect to be one of the most important deepwater oil development markets in the next decade, is why there is interest in a British pipe maker.
snippet: Offshore drilling in Brazil, which analysts expect to be one of the most important deepwater oil development markets in the next decade, is why there is interest in a British pipe maker.
lead_paragraph: What would General Electric want with a small British manufacturer of oil pipe?
